oracion1: “I learned about forests. Yexwoz, you’re next.”

oracion2: Hi, Yexwoz. Where are you from?
This is a beach in my beautiful country Costa Rica.

oracion1: What do you do at the beach?
oracion2: I like to play in the water and build things in the sand.

oracion1: I like to eat ice cream on the beach.
What is the weather like at the beach?.
oracion2: It is sunny here, but it rains in the mountains.

oracion1: I want to see the mountains.
oracion2: Ok. Here, take this rain jacket.
oracion3: What do you do in the mountains?
oracion4: You can hike, camp, and see wildlife. Costa Rica has many things to see and do!

oracion1: It is beautiful. Thank you. I will teach my alien friends about Costa Rica.
